entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
